Verses.9: Yet, you are in our midst, LORD. We are called by Your name. Do not leave us!

Changes: 2022-11-25 - Paul Prins: Unsure where verse 9 went, I retranslated it.
2022-08-12 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of verse 9.

FootNotes.9: Part 'a' is not needed for compline, it is: Why are you like a man taken by surprise, like a warrior who cannot save?
